text: Fury Records was set up by Bobby Robinson in 1957. In 1959 it had a Billboard No.1 hit with Kansas City, sung by Wilbert Harrison. In the early 1970s, the label launched early rap groups like Grandmaster Flash. == See also == * List of record labels *Fury Records artists Category:Defunct record labels of the United States Category:Record labels established in 1957
title: Fury Records
